title: Glaucoma: Sneak thief of sight

description: Discusses the causes, diagnosis, and control of glaucoma, stressing the urgency of early detection of the disease in order to prevent blindness. Depicts various forms of the disease and includes artwork sequences to explain the anatomy of the eye.
